title: How to Make Herbal Tinctures
author: JESSICKA FEBRUARY
description: Interested in DIY tinctures and extracts? Learn the difference between a tincture and an extract, how to take them, and how to create your own herbal tinctures at home!
cleaned_text: Featured Article [ The 2022 Video Contest ]() In 2009, we hosted our first video contest and with the growing interest in short-form video, we thought that 2022 would be the perfect time to bring it back! We want to see your creativity and love for a natural and sustainable lifestyle. One winner will be chosen
